title.narrative: Implementation of SORUDEV Smallholders' Component in Northern Bahr el Ghazal State

description.narrative: Overall objective: Contribute to increased food security, reduced vulnerability and enhanced livelihoods of rural households in NBeGSpecific objective: Sustainably increase agricultural production and agricultural income of smallholder farmers in through the setup of functional agricultural and livestock advisory and extension services that effectively reaches smallholder farmers, particularly poor farmers, youth and women farmers.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to South Sudan

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to South Sudan

description.narrative: Counties of Aweil Centre, Aweil West and Aweil North, in Northern Bahr el Ghazal State, Republic of South Sudan

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
